p: Median interval times from illness onset to: first medical care was 1 d (IQR, 0–3 days); to admission was 4 days (IQR, 2–7.5 days); to confirmed diagnosis was 4 days (IQR, 2–7 days); to positive nucleic acid result was 4 days (IQR, 2–7 days). Median interval from first medical care to positive nucleic acid result was 2 days (IQR, 1–4 days).
